content: Hello, i just logged into the Whova web app, but, I am unable to locate any link to download the recorded sessions. Any ideas where can one find the same? Thanks in advance.

Hi @Calvin, all attendees should have received the link and a code to access the recordings in an email titled 'Survey, Prizes and Access to Recordings'. They're hosted on HL7's Education on Demand site.
@Ward Weistra thank you for the note. Yes I received one email about the same. For some reason the Whova app shows links for recorded sessions but not the web browser based ...
